ItemDesc: Condensed anti-matter. Advanced material used for enhancement.
ItemBGDesc: Highly condensed anti-matter within the body of the Voidranger: Trampler. The moment of obliteration is the trumpet call for civilizations' destruction.\n\n"They are all looking forward to the moment of obliteration, when they will be reforged and fused with the entire world."

ItemComefrom.Desc: Antimatter Legion at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher
Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe
